## Natural Language Processing

- I use Python for doing linguistic analyses.
- [SpaCy](https://spacy.io/) has been my solution for basic lingusitic analysis such as POS tagging and dependency parsing.
- I also use SpaCy to train custom NLP models.
- When coding in Python, I use Visual Studio Code. I started using VS code when I worked on [MultiWordUnit Profiler](https://multiwordunitsprofiler.pythonanywhere.com/), which required me to edit html and css files simultaneously.
